attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We petition the PM to change the government's policy not to increase substantially the Approved Mileage Rates and Allowances for Travel.  These allowances for travel have not changed from 2002/03, these being:-
First 10,000 business miles in the tax year and then each business mile over 10,000 in the tax year - 
Cars and vans 40p and 25p respectfully
Motor cycles   24p and 24p 
Bicycles          20p and 20p 

The employee should not be required to subsidise their employer when using their own method of transport to do their work.
Petrol and Diesel have increased substantially as has road tax and insurance.  In addition, depreciation has increase on cars and is forecast to increase especially when they have done more mileage than average.

A change is required now to fairly reimburse the employees and continue simplicity for claiming expenses.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
